Sequence Information.Peptide Name: A3a [R7K] (AamAP1 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, scorpion, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (88.89%) toAamAP1I=L=F=K: 17%, A=G=S: 11%.Activity: active against E.coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 128 ug/ml), A. baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC 16 ug/ml), K.pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705 (MIC > 128 ug/ml), E.cloacae ATCC 700323 (MIC >128 ug/ml), P.aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC > 128 ug/ml), S. aureus MSSA ATCC 25923 (MIC 8 ug/ml).

Literature Information.Title: Improving the Activity and Selectivity of a Scorpion-Derived Peptide, A3a, against Acinetobacter baumannii through Rational Design.
